allData.occupation: Business Developer & Strategist | Management, Customer Service & Digital Marketing | Multicultural Experience | Data Science & Technology Enthusiast

positions.title: Manager at Super Buy Rite Jersey City
positions.description:
As a Beer Manager at Super Buy Rite, I lead the operations team in managing an extensive inventory of 3,500+ products, driving annual sales of approximately $5 million. My role encompasses a strategic balance between inventory management, purchasing oversight, budget tracking, sales optimization, and financial oversight, ensuring smooth and efficient operations aligned with the directives of general management.

Key Responsibilities and Achievements:

*  Implement Excel and Google Sheets dashboards for real-time inventory and sales trend analysis, enhancing decision-making processes.
*  Develop and execute promotional campaigns that boost product visibility and financial performance.
*  Manage purchasing processes and budget tracking to align with the company’s financial objectives and directives from general management.
*  Establish and maintain strong relationships with key suppliers, negotiating contracts to reduce operational costs and ensure consistent product availability.
*  Streamline logistics and restocking processes, achieving a 99% product availability rate.
*  Ensure strict regulatory compliance across all operations while prioritizing an exceptional customer experience.

I take pride in combining strategic planning, data-driven decision-making, and effective team leadership to deliver results in a dynamic retail environment.
positions.locationName: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States

allData.headline: Business Developer & Strategist | Management, Customer Service & Digital Marketing | Multicultural Experience | Data Science & Technology Enthusiast
allData.summary:
I am a Business Developer and Strategist with international experience in Customer Service, Digital Marketing, and Management, having worked in key markets across Latin America, Europe, and North America. My passion for new technologies, cultures, art, and photography, combined with my commitment to continuous learning in Data Science, drives me to overcome challenges and deliver results.

I hold a Bachelor’s degree in Administrative Sciences Engineering with a specialization in Business Management (recognized in Germany) and a Master’s degree in Business Development focused on Digital Transformation. My professional journey is supported by key competencies in:

    • Strategic negotiation and project management.
    • Strategic planning and digital marketing.
    • Multicultural management with a focus on innovation and creativity.

As a Peruvian-German citizen, my intercultural experience includes living and working in countries like Ecuador, Spain, Germany, the U.S., Costa Rica, and Canada. I am fluent in Spanish (native) and English, hold a B2 level in German, and have a functional understanding of Portuguese.

What Drives Me Professionally

Throughout my career, I have dedicated myself to transforming challenges into opportunities through innovative strategies and a global vision. My professional aspirations include:

    • Driving Digital Transformation: Designing and implementing strategies that accelerate digitalization and optimize operational efficiency.
    • Developing and Expanding Businesses: Identifying new market opportunities and leading their execution in the global tech sector.
    • Leading Strategic Projects: Managing complex initiatives that integrate emerging technologies with advanced management practices.
    • Fostering Innovation and Creativity: Creating dynamic work environments that value collaboration and strategic thinking.
    • Enhancing Customer Experience: Designing advanced technological solutions centered on user needs.
    • Leading Multicultural Teams: Empowering diverse talent and promoting a collaborative, results-oriented work environment.

My commitment to new technologies, global markets experience, and management expertise positions me as a professional ready to generate significant and sustainable impact in any organization.
